column1: # Title: Crop yield increases over inorganic fertilizer controls
# Comments: Assumes inorganic fertilizer application in baseline

# Source: Ye L. Camps Arbestain M. Shen Q. Lehmann J. Singh B. and Sabir M. 2020. Biochar effects on crop yields with and without fertilizer: A meta?analysis of field studies using separate controls. Soil Use and Management 36(1) pp.2-18.
